titleStmt.title: Eikōn basilikē, The pourtraicture of His Sacred Majestie in his solitudes and sufferings
Eikon basilike.
titleStmt.author: Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
Gauden, John, 1605-1662.

biblFull.extent: [8], 269 p., 1 folded leaf of plates : ill.

notesStmt.note: Variously attributed to Charles I and John Gauden. Cf. BM.

First edition, second issue. Printed by John Grismond for Richard Royston. "This issue appeared within a few days of the death the King, probably about 4 February." Cf. Madan, F.F. New bibl. of the Eikon basilike.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
